What is the ultimate goal of implementing Verus's protocols?

The ultimate goal is to create a public infrastructure that serves as a foundation for users and developers to build and use applications of the new era. This is expected to lead to rapid uptake and adoption of Verus.

s and then application systems are built around that, communicating through data. Verus has currently implemented payment, privacy and identity on its mainnet. Defi at the protocol level is in operation on testnet. Interoperability and blockchain creation is joining on testnet shortly, with data exchange to follow shortly thereafter.
Once these protocols are in place to serve as public infrastructure, Verus expects rapid uptake for users and developers of all kinds to continue building and using the applications of the new era.
